name: Domain Locker
short_description: Complete visibility of your domain portfolio with monitoring and alerts.
description: Complete visibility of your domain portfolio with monitoring and alerts. Domain Locker is a self-hosted application focused on security, tools, monitoring, dashboard. It can be deployed on any device via Docker Compose.
usecases: Self-host Domain Locker on your home server to complete visibility of your domain portfolio with monitoring and alerts without depending on third-party cloud services.
Use Domain Locker to manage your security workflows privately, keeping all data under your control on local infrastructure.
